duties_responsibilities.duty: End-to-end ownership of program scope, priorities, planning, resource management, schedule, budget, risks and issue management, and overall progress against business outcomes at the program and portfolio level.
Optimize the flow of value through the teams, facilitate the prioritization of all work ensuring alignment to the strategic roadmap, and manage the program backlog that feeds work to the teams.
Develop program metrics and continually monitor and report on the progress of programs to all stakeholders, project team members, and the Strategic Management Office.
Mentor team members in agile and scrum methodologies through an agile transformation, all the while promoting best practices and driving continuous improvement.
Lead a team of marketing specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in related degree or equivalent experience (Master's degree preferred)
PMI-ACP, CSM, PgMP, PMP or equivalent
